item.title: Remembering Lucky Dragon: A Brief, Bold Chapter in Vintage Las Vegas Strip History
item.description:
A New Kind of Vegas Dream: The Lucky Dragon’s Debut

For decades, Las Vegas has thrived on innovation and reinvention. While mega-resorts and themed experiences are practically synonymous with the Strip, the Lucky Dragon Hotel & Casino, which opened in late 2016, attempted something refreshingly different â€“ an immersive, authentic Asian lifestyle experience. It wasn’t just about gambling; it was about a holistic cultural journey. As the first ground-up hotel-casino built since the Cosmopolitan a decade prior, it promised to be a landmark.
